concept.title: Basic Installation with Custom Libraries
concept.shortdesc: You can download and install a basic version of the , and then install individual stage libraries as needed.

conbody.p: installationbasic with custom librariesThe basic installation includes the , development stages, all processors, and the origins and destinations in the basic stage library, such as Directory and Local FS. You can then use the package manager to specify the additional stage libraries that you'd like to install.
You can also use the package manager to create a script so you can easily repeat the custom installation on additional machines.
Use the basic installation to install only the stage libraries that you want to use. The basic installation also results in downloading smaller installation files.
